subject: These,  certainly will not
body:
These,  certainly will not be in vain, I have moved on with the second partner, I was not deceived.
Charlene.

subject: Re:    These,  certainly will not
body:
Hello Charlene,

That's interesting to hear. Could you please elaborate more on your experience with the second partner? How did it differ from the first one?

Best wishes,
Chris

subject: Re: These, certainly will not
body:
Hello Chris,

Thank you for this rather belated response, I would like to crave your
indulgence to please resend my initial proposal I sent to you to ascertain
this mail was actually sent to you.

The reasons are not far-fetched, first, you have  instances where hackers
attack mails sent to others and eventually change the narratives.

You have  situations where the original recipients are shortchanged and
these cinimals parade themselves as the intended receivers.

I will appreciate it if you comply.

Charlene.

subject: Re: These, certainly will not
body:
Hello Charlene,

Thank you for reaching out and expressing your concerns. I understand the importance of security in our digital communications. However, I'm afraid I can't recall the specifics of your initial proposal. Could you please provide a brief summary or key points from it? This would help me to remember and ensure that we're on the same page.

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Chris

subject: Re: These, certainly will not
body:
Hello Chris,

I am afraid this does help at all, I would have erred on the side of
caution if I compromise this, thank you very much all the same.

Charlene.

subject: Re: These, certainly will not
body:
Hello Charlene,

I appreciate your response. I understand your concerns and it's always good to be cautious. Could you please elaborate on what exactly you're worried about? Maybe we can find a solution together.

Best wishes,
Chris

subject: Re: These, certainly will not
body:
Hello Chris,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your effort in trying to help me, but I'm afraid I didn't quite understand what you meant. Could you please explain it a bit more? I just want to make sure that I'm not misunderstanding anything here. Thanks again for your time and patience.

Best wishes,
Chris

subject: Re: These, certainly will not
body:
Hi Chris,

Do well by proving that you were the intended recipient of the original
proposal,  by sending your passport or any suporting document.

Charlene.

subject: Re: These, certainly will not
body:
Hi Charlene,

Thank you for your message. I'm really interested in the proposal you mentioned, but I'm not comfortable sharing my passport or any personal documents online. Could you please provide more details about the proposal? What does it involve and how can I contribute?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Chris

subject: Re: These, certainly will not
body:
Hi Chris,

You ought to have realized by now that monetary consideration is very low
in my estimation, integrity, transparency and accountability, take
precedence over and above any other consideration.

Do have a pmeasant day.

Charlene.

subject: Re: These, certainly will not
body:
Hi Chris,

I hope this message finds you well. I just wanted to share with you that money isn't the most important thing for me. There are other things in life that I value more, like integrity and honesty. 

Can you tell me more about your perspective on this? Do you also believe there are things more valuable than money?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Chris

subject: Re: These, certainly will not
body:
Hi Chris,

Put succinctly, I would like to call you if you avail me your phone number,
enough of these rhetorics.

Charlene

subject: Re: These, certainly will not
body:
Hi Chris,

I hope this message finds you well. I appreciate your interest in having a more direct conversation. However, I'm more comfortable continuing our discussion here for now. Is there something specific you wanted to talk about over the phone? 

Looking forward to hearing from you.

Best wishes,
Chris

subject: Re: These, certainly will not
body:
Hi Chris,

It is about time we called this goodbye, for certain, all is not right, do
have a pleasant day.

Charlene.

subject: Re: These, certainly will not
body:
Hi Chris,

I hope this message finds you well. I was just thinking about our last conversation and I realized there were a few things that I didn't quite understand. Could you possibly explain them to me again? 

Looking forward to hearing from you soon.

Best wishes,
Chris
